content.rendered:
The 100 -119 hp bulldozer is great for various maintenance and earthmoving jobs. Its powerful blade can be used in tasks from road construction to landscaping projects. Due to its large size, it can also help clear debris from demolition zones as well as any trees, branches, rubble or any other materials from a work site. It also comes equipped with tracks to help disperse its weight and prevent slipping and sinking on various terrain.

  • Powerful blade
  • Great for road maintenance
  • Tracks on tires prevent sinking
